headline: Here Is What You Need To Know Before Investing In VeriSign, Inc. (VRSN)
summary: VeriSign, Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSN) is among the Renaissance Technologies Portfolio: 10 Biggest Stocks, with the hedge fund having investments of over $943 million in the company, as of June 30, 2025. It is a global provider of network infrastructure and domain name registry services, and serves as the sole registry of the .com and .net domains, […]
